      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Table.Column.add(int startRow, Component... components) 
      void Table.add(int rowNumber, int columnNumber, Component... components)
      Adds the given Components to this Table, where the row and column number determine where the first Component will appear, and all subsequent Components will follow the first in the column.
      void Container.add(T... children)
      Adds the component to this container, using the inflated properties of that component to determine the bounds it may occupy within this container.
      void Table.insertColumn(int columnNumber, Component... components) 
      void Table.insertIntoColumn(int rowNumber, int columnNumber, Component... components)
      Inserts the given Components into this table at the specified row and column, shifting any elements within that column downward to accommodate these new elements.
      default void Layout.setComponentBounds(Component child)
      Sets the bounds of a Component, using the parameter object that the component has defined.
